about_the_game:
An adventure that wasn't meant to be - it's here

The Finnish War x Sotidrokhima: Finlandsaga is an epic follow-up to two previous games by AcroGames - The Finnish War (2022) and Sotidrokhima (2022).
Finlandsaga is a hybrid hack-n-slash/real-time strategy game, mixing both gameplay and story elements from the two last-mentioned games. It combines the hack-n-slash action of Sotidrokhima with the calculative strategy gameplay of The Finnish War. The story centers around the Finnish national epic Kalevala, and connects its events to modern day, as well as with characters from the Finnish War and Sotidrokhima.
The game can however be enjoyed by anyone, even those new to the two preceding titles - or Finnish mythology.
Finlandsaga is well self-aware of its odd premise, and takes it all the way. Blood will fly, gore will spurt, and a rocking soundtrack sends our heroes off on their epic quest to save Finland.

Features

  • combined hack n' slash and RTS action
  • blood and gore galore!
  • rocking original soundtrack
  • mow down hundreds of enemies with effective special moves

short_description: The heroes of Finland's past must come together to save the land from oblivion in the hands of the sorcerer, Louhi. The game is a non-canonical sequel to The Finnish War and Sotidrokhima, combining hack-n-slash and real-time strategy gameplay from the two titles.
